charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_1101_0:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was doing some
shopping downtown, a fun, flashy
apparel shop caught [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] eye.

[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] paused for a moment, mesmerized by the
trendy outfits on display, until [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] noticed Elesa
and Zebstrika out of the corner of [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] eye.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_1201_0:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Didn’t think I’d run into you here!
Are you shopping for some new clothes?

You could be pretty dazzling with a little
touch-up here and an accessory there...
I’d love to style you one day, if you’re up for it.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0401_0:
Well, yeah. Modeling is busy work!
Right now, I’m trying to find the designer of
those sygna suits I keep hearing about.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0302_0: Are you here to shop, too?
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0402_0:
No, I’m technically here for work. I’m trying to
find the designer of those sygna suits I keep
hearing about.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_1201_1: They’re ALL the rage on Pasio right now.

Sygna suits are special... They bring out the
unique sparkle of every single sync pair that
wears them.

But you know what? The clothes don’t make
the person. A fancy outfit is meaningless if the
person underneath it has no shine of their own.

That’s why I’ve gotta sparkle so bright that I
outshine any sygna suit!
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0401_1:
Aww! Thanks, sweetie.
I couldn’t be happier if that’s how you see me!
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0402_1:
Of course you do, sweetie! All you have to do is
be yourself. You can put on fancy clothes, too,
but it’s your individuality that really shines.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_1201_1:
When it comes to the world of fashion,
I’m in the spotlight.

I basically turn people’s dreams into reality,
so the trends follow me wherever I go...
and I just keep on doing what I do.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_1201_2:
Sometimes I get so caught up in speeding along
that I don’t realize I’ve left people behind.

But Zebstrika’s always right there keeping pace
with me. I know that without even having to turn
around and check!

Nah, that’s a lie... Whenever I start to slow down,
Zebstrika always zooms right past me.

She’s a good rival—always keeping me on my
toes. I can’t let my guard down around her.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0401_2:
Oh, absolutely! But it’s more than that.
We’re sync pairs, so we’re always in sync.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0302_2: Aren’t you supposed to be partners?
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0402_2:
Of course! We’re a sync pair, so we’re always
in sync, even if one of us is racing ahead.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_1201_2:
No one can beat us when it comes to
comedic timing.

For example, I have this joke that I like to tell:
“What do you call a storm of Pokémon?”
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_1201_3:
And when I say the punchline: “A Pokémonsoon,”
Zebstrika creates a bolt of lightning and it always
gets us a bunch of laughs!

It’s all about timing—ask any good comedian.
That’s why our combo is so shockingly funny!
